subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ronnie Belliard hit a go-ahead single in the eighth inning off John Smoltz, and the visiting Washington Nationals defeated the Atlanta Braves, 2-0, last night to stop a six-game losing streak.
snippet: Ronnie Belliard hit a go-ahead single in the eighth inning off John Smoltz, and the visiting Washington Nationals defeated the Atlanta Braves, 2-0, last night to stop a six-game losing streak.
